article_title: Maldives’ Ex-President Sentenced to 13 Years in Prison After Disputed Trial
article_text:
MALE, Maldives—A former president of the Maldives was convicted and sentenced to 13 years in prison after a quick and disputed trial that raised fears of more instability in the Indian Ocean nation.

A three-judge panel ruled Friday that Mohamed Nasheed, the country’s first democratically elected president, issued an illegal order to detain a...
